synopsis.text: Takuya Saotome, a childhood friend, and an eccentric teacher, Teruhiko Saionji, welcome Yoshiki Maeda to Baraman High School, an elite private boys' school. After a seven-year separation, Yoshiki is reunited with Takuya and meets various intriguing characters on campus, including the rebellious teacher and the soccer team captain. As he navigates the school's complex social landscape, Yoshiki discovers a world filled with absurd and exaggerated romantic antics. With his younger sister Yuu teasing him about the attractive boys, Yoshiki's high school life is about to take an unexpected turn. This school love story offers a unique blend of friendship, love, and conflict, promising a thrilling and entertaining journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
